title: Solutions for plastic pollution | Nature Geoscience
body: Plastic pollution is a global problem, found even in regions with limited influence from human activities, including Mount Everest 3 and the Arctic 4. In order to address plastic pollution ...

Solutions for plastic pollution. Nat. Geosci. 16, 655 (2023). https://doi.org/10.1038/s41561-023-01255-7
summary:
The text emphasizes the importance of privacy and choice in managing cookie preferences. It informs users about the use of essential and optional cookies, and the implications of accepting optional cookies on the processing of personal data. The tone is informative and respectful of user privacy. 

Sentiment: 0.5
